markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Metamorphic](/Traits.aspx?ID=282)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 253</row>

On planes with this trait, the plane’s physical nature can be changed by things other than physical force or magic.
name: Metamorphic
